egov-security:config.jdbcUsersByUsernameQuery: SELECT ADMIN_ID, AUTHOR_CD, EMP_NO, ADMIN_PASS_UPDT_DT, ADMIN_LOCKYN, ADMIN_PWD, EMP_NM, DEPT_NM, GRAD_NM, PSIT_NM, USE_YN, EMP_CLPHN, EMP_TLPHN, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_STATE, EMP_PIC FROM VW_EMPINFO WHERE ADMIN_ID =?
egov-security:config.jdbcAuthoritiesByUsernameQuery: SELECT ADMIN_ID, AUTHOR_CD FROM VW_EMPINFO WHERE ADMIN_ID = ?

egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlHierarchicalRoles: SELECT a.CHLDRN_ROLE child, a.PARNTS_ROLE parent FROM COMTNROLES_HIERARCHY a LEFT JOIN COMTNROLES_HIERARCHY b on (a.CHLDRN_ROLE = b.PARNTS_ROLE)
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndUrl: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN url, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM COMTNROLLINFO a, COMTNAUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'url' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndMethod: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN method, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM COMTNROLLINFO a, COMTNAUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'method' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndPointcut: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN pointcut, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM COMTNROLLINFO a, COMTNAUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'pointcut' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRegexMatchedRequestMapping: SELECT a.resource_pattern uri, b.authority authority FROM LETTNROLEINFO a, COMTNAUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'regex' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
